text: Futhi mayelana nodonga (olwaseluwa) lwalungolwabafanyana ababili abayizintandane edolobheni (emphakathini) futhi ngaphansi kwalo (udonga) kwakunomnotho wazo zombili (lezizintandane) futhi uyise (ukhokho) wazo zombili wayengolungileyo ngakho-ke iNkosi yakho yayihlose ukuthi bobabili bafinyelele ekukhuleni ngokwanele bese bobabili bekwaziukukhiphaumnothowabo, longumusaovelaeNkosini yakho ngakho-ke angikwenzanga lokho ngokuthanda kwami, lokho kuyincazelo (nokuhunyushwa) kwako konke lokho owawungakwazi ukukubekezelela
